item.title: vCloud Director 9.0: NSX Edge Gateway cluster placement
item.description: This post will highlight a long awaited feature, and is now available in vCloud Director 9.0. It will depict how to enforce the placement of the NSX Edge Gateways in a resource pool, which ultimately leverages a specific vSphere Cluster. Over the last revisions of vCloud Director, one thing we couldn’t accomplish easily was to ensure all N/S traffic from the NSX VXLAN overlay to interconnecting with the physical underlay/networks, usually VLAN Based.
